items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Beautify™’s Weft Release is our solvent remover made for cleaning hair extension wefts!">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Beautify™’s Weft Release is our solvent remover made for cleaning hair extension wefts! With an oil base, low residue, and easy cleanup, Weft Release helps rid the weft of any leftover residue from previous installations. Along with a pleasant fragrance, Weft Release makes extension care easier.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription: Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin. External use only, do not digest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.displayname: Beautify - Weft Release - 4 fl oz, Drip-Top
items.storedisplayname2: Beautify - Weft Release - 4 fl oz, Drip-Top
items.storedescription:
Apply to area you want to remove. Wait 1 minute, then begin working bond loose. Apply more as needed. When complete, rinse residue from area with soap and water.

We recommend performing a patch test before use.
items.pagetitle: Beautify - Weft Release - 4 fl oz, Drip-Top | Walker Tape
